title: Need a bit of help to get better at ranked (currently bronze 5)
body:
Hey guys, i'm not that good at the game at the moment, i have my games where i carry but others i cant, i know its bad to blame it on my team but i have been getting trolls/feeders last few games, my win loss is 4 wins to 7 losses.

I would really love some opinions on what i can do, champions to play, attitude to have ect ect

Thank you :D

replies.body: Don't worry or stress about a game before you go into it. Doing this you are almost garen-tea'ed (get it) to tilt easier and not play as well. Just play the game like it is a normal game.

> [{quoted}](name=Area2609,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=oaymIiIa,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-23T18:42:52.856+0000)
>
> Don't worry or stress about a game before you go into it. Doing this you are almost garen-tea'ed (get it) to tilt easy er and not play as well. Just play the game like it is a normal game.

This. Always come into a ranked game with the mindset of being confident and not think that it's going to be incredibly difficult, etc.
I get the pun ;) thanks for the advice!

No matter how bad you think your team mates are, keep in mind that it is a team effort and that you have in one way or another contributed to your win or loss, and always think about what you COULD have done to maybe turn the defeat into victory. If you think every loss is on bad team mates, remember, you are the only factor that stays consistent throughout your games and there is absolutely nothing you can do to improve your team mates' play, so blaming and flaming them is futile. All you can improve, is yourself, and when you come to that realisation, improvement will show.
Alright sir i will keep that in mind, thank you ^.^
